sentences.en: But, as with oil, potash deposits are not evenly spread.
sentences.cn: 但是, 与原油一样, 全球钾矿资源的分布并不均匀.

sentences.en: Guanlong shares began his magic on this " trip of potash fertilizer. "
sentences.cn: 冠龙股份就此开始了其神奇的 “ 钾肥之旅 ”.

sentences.en: In Alberta people mine and drill for oil, potash, petrol and gas.
sentences.cn: 在亚伯达,人们采矿、打井开采石油 、 碳酸钾 、 汽油和天然气.

sentences.en: Mix ashe potash well with the water, add.
sentences.cn: 将碳酸钾和水充分混合.

sentences.en: Mix the potash well with the water.
sentences.cn: 充分地将钾碱和水混合.

sentences.en: Namely temperature of potash feldspar decomposition and calcium are favorable forming feldspar.
sentences.cn: 即温度升高对钾长石分解及钙长石形成均有利.

sentences.en: Once the salts melt, a gray - white substance is left. This is potash.
sentences.cn: 盐状物质融化后会剩下一种 灰白色 物质, 这就是碳酸钾.

sentences.en: One simple way to make soft soap requires nine kilograms of potash.
sentences.cn: 一种制肥皂的简便方法需要9克钾碱.

sentences.en: Potassium - feldspar is a main resource of potash fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 钾长石分解制钾肥是钾肥制造的一条重要途径.

sentences.en: Salt and potash coexists closely with oil and gas.
sentences.cn: 盐钾与油气有着密切的共存关系.

sentences.en: Some people make soap will potash with potash lye.
Some people make soap with potash ash lye.
sentences.cn: 有的人用钾碱液制作肥皂.

sentences.en: The most important use of potash is in fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 钾盐的最重要的用途是作肥料.

sentences.en: The thermal dissociation of the potassium shale - potash system has been experimentally investigated.
sentences.cn: 通过实验探讨了富钾页岩+碳酸钾体系热分解反应过程.

words.tran_cn: [无化]碳酸钾；草碱；苛性钾；钾化合物

trans.tran_en: a type of potassium used especially in farming to make the soil better
